name: $provisional
desc: One of a set of potential (and typically mutually exclusive) diagnoses asserted to further guide the diagnostic process and preliminary treatment.

name: $differential
desc: There is sufficient diagnostic and/or clinical evidence to treat this as a confirmed condition.

name: $confirmed
desc: This condition has been ruled out by diagnostic and clinical evidence.

name: $refuted
desc: The statement was entered in error and is not valid.

name: $entered-in-error
desc: The condition status is unknown.  Note that "unknown" is a value of last resort and every attempt should be made to provide a meaningful value other than "unknown".
